articles.title: Why 'godfather of AI' Geoffrey Hinton thinks humanity at crossroads | podcast - The Guardian
articles.description: In an interview with the Guardian’s Alex Hern, Hinton says he now fears the advances he helped usher in could pose an existential threat to humankind
articles.content: The 75-year-olds researcher has helped lay the foundations for the revolution in artificial intelligence, but now Geoffrey Hinton is worried. His work on neural networking building computer systems t… [+641 chars]

articles.author: Ariana Garcia
articles.title: Why astronomers spotting a star eat planet is bad news for Earth - Chron
articles.description: For the first time ever, astronomers have discovered a star devouring its own planet. Earth may befall the same fate in the future.
articles.content: For the first time ever, a group of scientists caught a sun-like star devouring a planet. Unfortunately, the discovery may also foreshadow Earth's fate in about five billion years. In a study publish… [+3590 chars]
